opinions.text:
ORDER
The petitioner’s motion for stay of a Superior Court order denying a continuance of the trial of petitioner is hereby denied.'

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Stephen Lichatin III, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff-respondent.
William P. Reilly, Public Defender, Allegra E. Munson, Marvin E. Clemons, John A. MacFadyen III, Asst. Public Defenders, for defendant-petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. Verlin CLARK, Jr.
No. 80-97-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 5, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Stephen Lichatin III, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff-respondent.
William P. Reilly, Public Defender, Allegra E. Munson, Marvin E. Clemons, John A. MacFadyen III, Asst. Public Defenders, for defendant-petitioner.
